name: VR Roller Coaster Simulator - Cardboard Theme Park
name_original: VR Roller Coaster Simulator - Cardboard Theme Park
description:
Welcome in VR Roller Coaster named Goliatus.
It's pretty big, fast, and noisy.
All this experience you can find in this Virtual Reality Simulation.
Features:
- Google Cardboard powered for mobile VR.
- Exciting VR roller coaster experience.
- 2 Roller Coasters
- 3 scenes DAY, NIGHT and SPACE

Requires one of this:
- VR-Box
- CardBoard
- Goggle VR


Works with any mobile stereoscopic headset with a built in accelerometer.
